original_title: Nishant Tanwar : Dilli Se Hoon B*@!%D
overview: Delhi boy Nishant Tanwar’s latest stand-up special “Dilli Se Hoon B*@!%D” is a code for all Delhiites to abide by. Known as bhai by his fans, Nishant shares hilarious life experiences, the background he comes from, his dad, his friends, his girlfriend and his girlfriend’s boyfriend.
title: Nishant Tanwar : Dilli Se Hoon B*@!%D
